feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: NBA 2024-25 Season Begins - Season 4 Episode 1”
entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back and they give their full standing prediction award winners and what they believe will be the NBA finals matchup for the 2024-25 NBA season.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: New York Knicks Trade for KAT, Dikembe Mutombo Tribute, 3 Biggest Storylines to Watch This Season, and NBA Coaches List - Season 3 Episode 38”

link.title: New York Knicks Trade for KAT, Dikembe Mutombo Tribute, 3 Biggest Storylines to Watch This Season, and NBA Coaches List - Season 3 Episode 38”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back and they discuss the Knicks blockbuster trade for Karl-Anthony Towns. The guys also discuss the death of NBA legend Dikembe Mutombo and the legacy he left not just in basketball but in life. To finish up the boys each give their 3 biggest storylines ahead of the start of the season and they debate about a head coaches list that was made by CBS sports. New York Knicks trade for KAT, Dikembe Mutombo tribute, 3 biggest storylines to watch this season, and NBA coaches list.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: WOJ Retires, Three Biggest NBA Storylines, and Joel Embiid Contract - Season 3 Episode 37”

link.title: WOJ Retires, Three Biggest NBA Storylines, and Joel Embiid Contract - Season 3 Episode 37”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah discuss the shocking retirement from ESPN reporter Adrian Wojnarowski. The guys also discuss what they believe are the biggest storylines in the NBA heading into the season as well as Joel Embiid’s new contract extension.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. entry.title: USA Wins Gold, NBA Schedule Reveal, and NBA Contract Extensions - Season 3 Episode 36”

link.title: USA Wins Gold, NBA Schedule Reveal, and NBA Contract Extensions - Season 3 Episode 36”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah give their thoughts on the USA winning gold in the Paris Olympic Games. They also discuss the NBA schedule for the upcoming season and go over some new free agent signings and extensions.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. entry.title: DeRozan, Team USA Roster, Trade Rumors, and the Next Moves for Top Contenders - Season 3 Episode 35”

link.title: DeRozan, Team USA Roster, Trade Rumors, and the Next Moves for Top Contenders - Season 3 Episode 35”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah discuss DeMar Derozan in Sacramento and his fit with a talented Kings roster. They also talk about Team USA’s roster and the move to replace Kawhi Leonard with Derrick White. Then, Jack and Noah talk trade rumors and how contending teams should finish up their offseason.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. entry.title: Boston Celtics Win NBA Title, Knicks Trade for Mikal Bridges and NBA Draft First Round Reaction - Season 3 Episode 33”

link.title: Boston Celtics Win NBA Title, Knicks Trade for Mikal Bridges and NBA Draft First Round Reaction - Season 3 Episode 33”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back this week to discuss the Boston Celtics winning their 18th championship in franchise history. The guys also discuss some of the offseason moves already made such as the Mikal Bridges trade to the Knicks and the Alex Caruso trade to Thunder. Finally to end the show the boys give their thoughts on the first round of the NBA Draft.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Celtics vs. Mavs for the Title, Caitlin Clark, JJ to LA, NBA TV Contract - Season 3 Episode 32”

link.title: Celtics vs. Mavs for the Title, Caitlin Clark, JJ to LA, NBA TV Contract - Season 3 Episode 32”

entry.content:
On this week’s show, the guys break down the NBA Finals, which start with Game 1 on Thursday. They discuss some X’s O’s, debate the biggest storylines, and make their official picks for this much-anticipated series. Then, Jack and Noah talk about the recent hard fouls on Caitlin Clark and how these unfortunate incidents could affect the rapidly-growing WNBA, as well as what the coaching hire of JJ Redick means for the Lakers. Finally, they wrap the show with a discussion on the NBA’s new massive TV contract and how much they’ll miss the legendary Inside the NBA crew on TNT.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Conference Finals Preview, TWolves Stun the Champs, and All the Knicks Got Hurt Against Indy, Dallas Holds off OKC - Season 3 Episode 31”

link.title: Conference Finals Preview, TWolves Stun the Champs, and All the Knicks Got Hurt Against Indy, Dallas Holds off OKC - Season 3 Episode 31”

entry.content:
On this week’s show, the guys look ahead to the Conference Finals with Mavs-TWolves and Celtics-Pacers starting up this week. They also break down the two Game 7s from Sunday, where Minnesota staged a wild comeback to knock off the defending champion Nuggets and the Pacers shot nearly 70% to blow out the injured Knicks at MSG.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Round 2 and the Coaching Carousel, Knicks-Pacers Madness, Denver Trying to Comeback, Bud Replaces Vogel, and Much More - Season 3 Episode 30”

link.title: Round 2 and the Coaching Carousel, Knicks-Pacers Madness, Denver Trying to Comeback, Bud Replaces Vogel, and Much More - Season 3 Episode 30”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah break down the second round of the playoffs as all 4 series approach the midway point. The Knicks and Pacers continue to play tight and wild games, the TWolves took home court from the defending champs, and the top seeded Thunder and Celtics are trying to hold off an upset. In addition, the guys discuss the coaching market in Phoenix and LA, as Frank Vogel has been replaced by Mike Budenholzer with the Suns, and the Lakers are in the midst of finding their next coach after the firing of Darvin Ham.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
